description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The World before the Deluge ... Containing twenty-five ideal landscapes of the ancient world, designed by Riou, and two hundred and eight figures of animals, plants [with illustrative text] ... Translated from the fourth French edition [by W. S. O.]]" Author: FIGUIER, Guillaume Louis. Contributor: BRISTOW, Henry William. Contributor: O., W. S. Contributor: RIOU, Édouard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 07107.h.28." Page: 226 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1867 Edition: New edition. The geological portion carefully revised, and much original matter added, by H. W. Bristow. Containing ... illustrations ... by Riou, etc. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001232583 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
